contentfolder.description: Sets the path to the main content folder which contains all image- and file folders

adminfolder.description: Sets the path to the admin folder

startpath.title: Start Path
startpath.description: Sets the path to the first gallery folder to display on startup. If set to false, no gallery will display automatically on startup

htmlstartpath.title: HTML Start Path
htmlstartpath.description: Sets the path to the first gallery folder to display in HTML gallery

startmode.description: Sets the gallery to display either thumbnails or fullsize image on gallery start

language.description: Enter the name of the language you wish to use. The language must exist as a language file.

useswfaddress.description: Enables flash deep linking and browser navigation with the SWFAddress module

url_params.description: Sets a group of parameters from the config that may be set from url parameters

settings.url_params: globalpath, theme, contentfolder, startpath, startmode, language, maincontrols, stylesheet

allowedext.description: Sets an array of extensions which the Imagevue scripts are allowed to handle

settings.allowedext: mp3, jpg, png, gif, jpeg, swf, doc, docx, flv, mp4, m4v, html, pdf, txt

excludefilesprefix.description: Select prefixes which will be excluded by the file handling

includefilesext.description: Sets default extensions to be included in file handling

settings.includefilesext: jpg, gif, png, jpeg, flv, mp4, m4v, swf, docx, doc, html, txt, pdf

sitetitle.description: Sets the title of the site

enableHTML.description: Enable HTML gallery, if set to false you will have only Flash gallery

useLightview.title: Lightbox view
useLightview.description: Use Lightbox View for Photos in HTML

defaultSortFiles.description: Default files sorting method - name, date or size

defaultViewAs.description: Default item list view - grid or list

width.description: Width of the bounding box for resize

height.description: Height of the bounding box for resize

resizeDefault.description: Resize images before upload by default (you can controls this when you upload also)

autoTitling.description: Sets filenames to appear as title by default. If set to false, titles will be empty unless added from the admin

image.description: Decides what custom attributes are available for images

folder.description: Decides what custom attributes are available for folders

ownerEmail.description:
Enter your Email address for contact form to work, use comma to separate more than one email. Example:
you@youremail.com,another@youremail.com

ownerBcc.description: When somebody shares a link from your gallery send an Email to the owner also

sendlinkSubj.description: Default subj for link sending email

email.sendlinkSubj: You have received a link from [senderName]!

forceFrom.description: If your hosting allows emails to be sent only from a certain email address (like GoDaddy), add the address here or write 'none' to send emails without from field.

disableImageMeta.description: Disable EXIF/IPTC meta data display for images

enabled.description: Enables or disables the main controls module

items.description: Selects what items to display in the main controls

autohide.description: Only display the main controls when rolling over the appropriate area of the screen

align.description: Sets the alignment of the main controls

margin.description: Sets the margin of the main controls in respect to its alignment

locktothumbnails.description: This setting automatically aligns the controls above the thumbnailscroller

enabled.description: Enables the large alternative next and previous controls

autohide.description: Hides the large controls if there is no mouse activity

margin.description: Sets the margin for the large controls in regards to the alignment

controls.description: Specifies an array of controls available in the right-click context menu, and in which order they appear. Items are context-sensitive, and will vary depending on the property of the item being right-clicked

fullscreen_click.description: Sets the gallery to enter fullscreen mode after visitor clicks first time anywhere in the gallery

keycontrols.description: Enable arrow controls to be used for navigating the gallery - next/previous/togglethumbnails/toggleplay

inverse_controls.description: Inverse the direction of all next/previous controls in the gallery

mousewheel.description: Sets interactivity method for the mousewheel

altimage.description: Sets an extended folder path '_altimage/' to open a different version of selected image. Effects the functions popup, window and download image

path.description: Sets the initial path for the audio folder

use_imagefolder.description: Sets the audioplayer to load tracks from active imagefolder if mp3 files exist

autostart.description: Sets the audioplayer to play when gallery starts

startvolume.description: Sets the initial volume of the audioplayer

repeat.description: Sets how many times a track or playlist will loop. 0 for unlimited

minimum_connection.description: Sets the minimum connection speed|kb/s| required for the audioplayer to run

sorting.description: Sets the sorting order for list of audio tracks. Set to auto to have the tracks sorted manually from the admin.

id3tags.description: Sets what ID3 tags to display

showcontrols.description: Show or hide the 3 controls previous, playtoggle and next

margin.description: Sets the minimum margin for the image relative to the outer boundaries of the stage

scale_limit.description: When set to true, prevents the image from scaling larger than 100% of original size when the visitor uses the zoom buttons

scale_reset.description: Resets to the original zoom/scale when a new image is loaded

original_optimized.description: Displays image at original size if it fits within stage, although it may break the margin setting. May provide better image quality(display image unscaled), but at the cost of possibly overlapping controls and missing descriptions

click.description: Sets the event when mouse clicking current image

shiftclick.description: Sets the event when mouse clicking current image

autostart.description: Sets the slideshow to play on start(autostart)

interval.description: Sets the interval(in seconds) between images when slideshow is in play mode

end_event.description: Sets the action on slideshow end event. To use the 'url' option, you must enable the 'url1' setting in attributes -> folder, before you can create separate urls for each folder from the admin

loop.description: Loops the slideshow seamlessly between last image and first image.

jsresize.description: Resizes POPUP window to fit displayed image in slideshow mode

enabled.description: Sets a group of buttons which appear on top of current image

align.description: Sets the alignment of the buttons

autohide.description: Only shows the buttons when mouse is over image

buttons.description: Select which buttons to be used when hovering over the image

margin.description: sets the margin between the buttons and the edge of the image

enabled.description: Sets a 'close' button to appear at top right of the image, which returns the viewer to thumbnails mode on click

autohide.description: Only shows the close button when mouse is over image

enabled.description: Toggles this description node on or off

style.description: Sets the display style of the description node

event.description: Decides on what event the description triggers

items.description: Decides what description items to display in this description node

width.description: Sets the width of the textitem for styles that support 'width' including: right,left,over_image_left,over_image_right. May be set as a percentage of the image width by using the % symbol

margin.description: Sets the margin around the textbox

height.description: Sets the maximum height of the textitem for styles:below, above, over_image_top, over_image_bottom. Supports number or percentage%

enabled.description: Enable or disable this image layer

filepath.description: Filepath relative to your gallery document root

opacity.description: Sets the opacity of this image layer

align.description: Sets the alignment of this layer

margin.description: Sets the margin of this layer from the image edge

boxwidth.description: Sets the box constraint width parameter

boxheight.description: Sets the box constraint height parameter

resizetype.description: Method for creating thumbnails - resizetobox resizes images constrained within the boxwidth and boxheight parameters - croptobox resizes images to boxwidth and boxheight parameters, cutting away some of the image if necessary

click.description: Sets the event when clicking a thumbnail

shiftclick.description: Sets the event when shift-clicking a thumbnail

margin.description: Sets the margin between the sides of the screen and the thumbnails. TOP,RIGHT,BOTTOM,LEFT

min_width.description: Sets the minimum width for the thumbnails area

min_height.description: Sets the minimum height for the thumbnails area

max_width.description: Sets the maximum width for the thumbnails area

max_height.description: Sets the maximum width for the thumbnails area

horizontalamount.description: Force the amount of thumbnails to display horizontally. Leave at 0 for auto, so that thumbnails are created based on stage size. Use with care, as the interface UI cannot respond to all combinations for all screen sizes

verticalamount.description: Force the amount of thumbnails to display vertically. Leave at 0 for auto, so that thumbnails are created based on stage size. Use with care, as the interface UI cannot respond to all combinations for all screen sizes

text.description: Sets what text options to display above the thumbnails

sharebutton.description: Enable or disable the social media share button that displays above the thumbnails. Sharing must also be enabled for this button to display.

pagebuttons.description: Enable or disable the pagebuttons that display below the thumbnails when there are multiple pages

enabled.description: Toggle the thumbnailsscroller on or off

autohide.description: If set to true, hides the thumbnailscroller when inactive

autohide_offset.description: Sets how much to display from the thumbnailscroller when in hidden mode

tooltip.description: Inherits the same tooltip as used for standard thumbnails to display title and description

enabled.description: Enable or disable text tooltip on thumbnail rollover

items.description: Sets what items to display in the thumbnails tooltip text

interval.description: Sets the delay in milliseconds for the tooltip to display on thumbnail rollover

show_title.description: Enable or disable the title for the textpage

sharebutton.description: Enable or disable the social media share button that displays on the top right of the textpage. Sharing must also be enabled for this button to display.

items.description: Sets what items to display in the main menu

submenu_style.description: Sets submenu items to either display below or on the side of its parent menu item

close_same_level.description: Only one node within a parent can be expanded at the same time

autohide.description: Sets the menu to autohide when not active

startshow.description: If set to true, menu will not hide on startup

x_offset.description: Sets the x position of the menu from the top left corner

enabled.description: Enable or disable the mainmenu- descriptions and previewimage tooltip on menu mouse hover

items.description: Toggle items to be displayed in the mainmenu tooltip

menu_logo.description: Sets a logo above the menu. Using this setting overrides several other settings to facilitate the menu logo nicely. Use an absolute path, or a path relative from gallery root. Use PNG-24 or SWF with transparency.

enabled.description: Enable or disable the Share button, which will be available in several locations

sharebutton_click.description: Sets the mouse-click event for the main share button. If set to 'menu', mouse-click will toggle the native Imagevue sharing menu. If set to 'extended', mouse-click will display the sharing popover html layer with extended sharing options, just like the 'more' button

services.description: Select what services to display in the Imagevue Share menu. 'more', will display an extended list of services through AddThis on click. In addition to the services, you can add custom titles like this: service|Title. Services full list

addthis_username.description: If you have an AddThis(www.addthis.com) username, add it here to attribute shares in your AddThis analytics

volume.description: Sets the relative volume of sound effects from 1-100

external_player.description: Opens video files in an external player in a lightbox window. Although not as integrated as the internal player, it has better format support (FLV+MP4) and better fullscreen rendering. MP4 files always open in the external player.

controlsAutoHide.description: Choose to autohide the video controls, so they only display on mouse over

autoPlay.description: Sets the video to start automatically. If set to false, viewer will have to click the play button to start video

bufferTime.description: Sets the buffertime for loading videos. Does not apply if using external_player (default)

stopAudioPlayer.description: Stops the Imagevue audioplayer when a video loads, to make room for audio from the video file

align.description: Sets the alignment of the filemod

frame.description: Sets a frame to display behind the filemod. Frame parameters are inherited from image

text.description: Displays text above the filemod. Only works well with certain mods

textalign.description: Sets where to align the text

event.description: Sets on what event the hotspots appear

url_prefix.description: Sets an URL prefix for all hotspot links

window_target.description: Sets the window target for all hotspot links

keywords.description: Add a few keywords to your gallery separated by ,(comma). This will be added to the source code, and picked up by some search engines

seo.keywords: imagevue, flash, photo, image, gallery, slideshow

description.description: Add a description to your gallery. This will be added to the source code of your gallery, and the search engines will use it to display information about your site in their listings

counters.title: Footer code
counters.description: Add code for any 3rd party counters or stats, it will be displayed below the footer in div#counters

enabled.description: Enable or disable the Fotomoto shopping cart option. You will need Fotmoto account to use this option

siteKey.description: Your Fotomoto site key / Store ID

product_menu.description: Displays a fotomoto product submenu on mouse hover over the Fotomoto button in imagecontrols and maincontrols. If disabled, the menu will only react to click which is set in the option below

fotomotobutton_click.description: Sets the mouse-click event for the main fotomoto button. If set to 'menu', mouse-click will toggle the native Imagevue fotomoto dropdown menu. If set to 'window', mouse-click will immediately display the fotomoto window from it's default page.

default_page.description: Choose what default page the Fotomoto window opens on, unless a specific product-button is clicked. Default set to 'buy' shows the first product available for the item.

view.title: Folder view mode
view.options: Thumbnails, Images, Images with Info, Images with Info Below
view.description: Default mobile folder view mode. Select images to view full-size images listed vertically, with our without text info.

toolbar.title: Toolbar Title
toolbar.description: HTML to display in the header toolbar instead of the default folder titles.Your Gallery

heading.title: Global Header
heading.description: Html to display globally on the top of your mobile gallery. Good for logo image or similar. Elements wrapped in div tags will have whitepaces around them.<img src="iv-config/image_fullwidth.jpg"/><div>Text with whitespace</div>

startpage.title: Startpage Header
startpage.description: HTML to display on the frontpage only. Elements wrapped in div tags will have whitepaces around them.<img src="iv-config/image_fullwidth.jpg"/><div>Welcome text with whitespace</div>

footing.title: Footer
footing.description: Html to display globally in the footer of your mobile gallery. Good for name/company, contact info, copyright info, small logo or similar. Elements wrapped in div will have whitepaces around them.© Name

footer.title: Footer Toolbar
footer.description: HTML to display in the global footer toolbar. Leave it empty to remove the footer bar. You might need to add rel="external" to the link on the same domain. Powered by Imagevue

showMenuThumbnails.title: Show Thumbnails in Menu
showMenuThumbnails.description: Show thumbnails/icons in menu, or have a text-based menu

showMenuDescriptions.title: Show Descriptions in Menu
showMenuDescriptions.description: Show descriptions in menu, makes sense to disable with thumbnails

showFileCounters.title: Show File Counters in Menu
showFileCounters.description: Show file counters in the gallery list

jqueryMobileTheme.title: Theme
jqueryMobileTheme.description: Select a dark or light Mobile Theme
